name: Use Scroll
flavorText: With a little luck and guesswork, you can unlock the secrets an item holds.
text: You have picked up a few tricks that let you make use of scrolls, even though you might not have any formal magical training. During the practiceâ€™s duration, you figure out how to use a ritual scroll in your possession. At the completion of the practice, you perform the ritual on the scroll and can use Thievery in place of any other skill the scroll requires.
